sql.statement: create table cloudstore_sqlrun ( keyStr varchar(512) not null, appNo varchar(512) not null )

create table cloudstore_role ( id int auto_increment key not null, rolename varchar(512) not null, rolecode varchar(512) not null, roledesc varchar(512) not null, appcode varchar(512) not null, del int default 1 )

create table cloudstore_rolemember ( id int auto_increment key not null, roleid int not null, membertype int not null, memberobj int not null, rolelevel int not null, roleobj int not null, del int default 1 )
create table cloudstore_cdSerializeNo( id varchar(50), curNo varchar(300), supNo varchar(300), no1 varchar(300) )
create table cloudstore_tocstoken( token varchar(300) not null, license varchar(300) not null )
alter table cloudstore_tocstoken add loginconfig varchar(300) default 0
create table cloudstore_checkforuuid( id varchar(300) not null, uuid varchar(300) not null, type varchar(300) not null )
alter table cloudstore_checkforuuid add counts int
alter table cloudstore_checkforuuid add name varchar(300)

create table cloudstore_checkforuuidtimes( id int auto_increment key not null, uuid varchar(300) not null, updatetimes datetime, count int not null, counts int not null, type varchar(300) not null, urls varchar(300) )
create table cloudstore_checkforuuidtypes( id int auto_increment key not null, license varchar(300) not null, type varchar(300) not null )

create table cloudstore_checkforuuiddb( id int auto_increment key not null, fid varchar(300) not null default 0, type varchar(300) not null , enname varchar(300) not null , chname varchar(300) not null , dbname varchar(300) , dbtitle text , url varchar(300), dborder int )

create table cloudstore_defcol( id int auto_increment key not null, systemid varchar(300) not null default 0, col_base_id varchar(300) , pageid varchar(300) , pageuid varchar(300) , userid varchar(300) , orders varchar(300) , onlyWidth varchar(300) , width_ varchar(300) )

create table cloudstore_sdfcol( id int auto_increment key not null, isdefault varchar(1000), pageid varchar(1000) , pageuid varchar(1000) , align varchar(1000) , name varchar(1000) , column_ varchar(1000) , orderkey varchar(1000) , linkvaluecolumn varchar(1000) , linkkey varchar(1000) , href varchar(1000) , target varchar(1000) , transmethod varchar(1000), otherpara varchar(1000), orders int, width varchar(1000), text_ varchar(1000), labelid varchar(1000), hide_ varchar(1000), pkey varchar(1000), isfixed varchar(1000) )
drop table cloudstore_sdfcol
drop table cloudstore_defcol

create table cloudstore_sdfcol( id int auto_increment key not null, uuid varchar(1000) not null, pageuid varchar(1000) not null, _key varchar(1000) not null, display int , orders varchar(1000) , orderkey varchar(1000) , _text varchar(1000) )
create table cloudstore_defcol( id int auto_increment key not null, sysid varchar(1000) not null, userid varchar(1000) not null, pageuid varchar(1000) not null, orders varchar(1000) , display int )
create table cloudstore_appdb( serialNumber varChar(30) not null, uuid varchar(100) not null )
create table cloudstore_localerls( id int auto_increment key not null, localeindexid varchar(1000) not null, lableindexid varchar(1000) not null )
alter table cloudstore_defcol add dataIndex varchar(200) not null default ''
alter table cloudstore_defcol modify column orders int
